components.name: 1-butyl-3-methylpyridinium tetrafluoroborate
sample: 0.0513 water mass %(de-gassed by boiling or ultrasonically;molecular sieve treatment)

ref.full: Fernandez, L.; Montano, D.; Ortega, J.; Toledo, F. J. (2013) Ind. Eng. Chem. Res. 52, 11758-11766.
ref.title: Binary Liquid-Liquid Equilibria for Systems of Mono- or Disubstituted Haloalkanes (Cl, Br) and Pyridinium-Based Ionic Liquids. Advances in the Experimentation and Interpretation of Results
